cast.overview: Episodic journey of journalist Marcello who struggles to find his place in the world, torn between the allure of Rome's elite social scene and the stifling domesticity offered by his girlfriend, all the while searching for a way to become a serious writer.
cast.title: La Dolce Vita

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jacques Sernas (Lithuanian: Jurgis Šernas; sometimes credited as Jack Sernas; born 30 July 1925, died 3 July 2015) was a Lithuanian-born French actor with an international film career.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Jacques Sernas, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Jacques Sernas
